summary: This is an email from attorney Christian Everdell forwarding a memo endorsement from Judge Nathan to several recipients, including attorneys and possibly a client or associate. The email contains confidentiality notices and appears to be legal correspondence related to the Epstein case.

events.title: Memo Endorsement from Judge Nathan
events.description: Judge Nathan issues a memo endorsement that is forwarded via email by attorney Christian Everdell.

keyFacts: Attorney Christian Everdell forwarded a memo endorsement from Judge Nathan on May 3, 2021.
The email was sent to multiple recipients including Jeff Pagliuca, Laura NIciummci, and Bobbi C.
The correspondence includes a confidentiality notice, indicating sensitive legal information.
Christian Everdell is an attorney at COHEN & GRESSER LLP, which has offices in New York, Paris, Washington DC, and London.
The attached document is a memo endorsement from Judge Nathan, suggesting ongoing legal proceedings.
